abstract: Law enforcement officials say 17 members and associates of one of Clan Usuga, Colombia’s largest and most influential narcotics cartels, including its founder and current leader, have been indicted on drug trafficking charges.
lead_paragraph: Members and associates of one of Colombia’s largest and most influential narcotics cartels, including its founder and current leader, have been indicted on drug trafficking charges.

headline.main: Colombia: 17 Are Indicted in U.S. on Cocaine Trafficking Charges
headline.print_headline: The Americas; Colombia: 17 Are Indicted in U.S. on Cocaine Trafficking Charges

snippet: Members and associates of one of Colombia’s largest and most influential narcotics cartels, including its founder and current leader, have been indicted on drug trafficking charges.
